
```{r}
# split data 
indexdog <- sample(1:1000,size=0.8*1000)
traindog <- image_name[indexdog,1]
write.csv(traindog,file="Mydogtrain.csv")
indexchicken <- sample(1001:2000,size=800)
trainchicken <- image_name[indexchicken,1]
write.csv(trainchicken,file="Mychickentrain.csv")
```
